sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
In the below given figure, it is given that \(\angle PRQ = \angle RSP \). If \(PR = 5 \) cm, and \(PS = 4 \) cm, then find the length of QS
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 3, "step_txt": "Consider the triangles PSR and QPR , here we have
\[
	\angle \input[s1v1]{}\input[s1v2]{}\input[s1v3]{} = \angle SPR 
\]
\[
	\angle PRQ = \angle RSP 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
So, we can write that
\[
	\Delta \input[s2v1]{}RQ \sim \Delta PS\input[s2v2]{} 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{P\input[s3v1]{} }{PS } = \frac{\input[s3v2]{}Q }{PR } 
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{\input[s4v1]{} }{4 } = \frac{PQ }{5 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow PQ = \frac{25 }{\input[s4v2]{} }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
So, now 
\[
	QS = PQ - PS = \frac{25 }{4 } - \input[s5v1]{} = \frac{\input[s5v2]{} }{4 } cm
\]"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["P", "R", "Q"], "text": "$$\text{$\angle QPR = \angle SPR$, since both the angles are same and $\angle PRQ = \angle RSP $, as it is given}$$"}, {"data": ["P", "R"], "text": "$$\text{Therefore, we can write $\Delta PRQ \sim \Delta PSR $}$$"}, {"data": ["R", "P"], "text": "$$\text{Therefore, we can also write $\frac{PR }{PS } = \frac{PQ }{PR }$, as ratios of corresponding sides of similar triangles is proportional.}$$"}, {"data": [5, 4], "text": "$$\text{Putting the values and solving we get $PQ = \frac{25 }{4 }$}$$"}, {"data": [9, 4], "text": "$$\text{Since, $QS = PQ - PS$, therefore, it is equal to $\frac{25 }{4 } - 4 = \frac{9 }{4 }$ cm.}$$
\newline

"}]
